short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Konica Minolta Healthcare Americas' Exa Platform extension for Multi Monitor Support

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chromium based browser extension provides Konica Minolta Healthcare Americas' Exa Platform with the ability to open windows and/or position tabs across multiple monitors.
